name: imagecropper
description: A simple image cropper component for React Native using expo-image-cropper and expo-image-manipulator. Supports rectangular cropping with cancel functionality.

imageUri.name: imageUri
imageUri.description: The URI of the image to crop.

aspect.name: aspect
aspect.description: Aspect ratio for cropping (e.g., [1,1] for square).

style.name: style
style.description: Custom style for the cropper container.

onCrop.name: onCrop
onCrop.description: Callback when cropping is done. Returns the cropped image URI.

onCancel.name: onCancel
onCancel.description: Callback when the cancel button is pressed.
